## clipboard.paste() function

Pastes the last copied ICopyable into the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function paste(): ICopyable<ICopyData> | null;
```
**Returns:**

[ICopyable](./blockly.icopyable.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ICopyData](./blockly.icopydata.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| null

the pasted thing if the paste was successful, null otherwise.
